title: In Game Mlazahar Recall Poro is all Blue?

embed.description: This is simply to share with Riot Support. It could be a possible glitch or maybe that I am missing a texture file? All things in the clip belong to Riot Games.

body:
I think it may be purely cosmetic but I noticed a glitch when recalling during a TT. The poro on Snowday Malzahar is purely blue. 

I came here to ask if this is also happening in anyone else's games of if this may just be mine? 
Thanks :)

replies.body:
Hey LadyMara -

This is an issue on our end, and doesn't relate to your PC's settings. We're aware of the issue and are working on a fix!
